title: Parma-wrapped lemon sole
ingredients: ['900 g (2 lb) floury potatoes, such as King Edwards, peeled and cut into large chunks', '8 very thin slices Parma ham, about 125 g (4½ oz) in total, trimmed of fat', '4 large lemon sole fillets, about 150 g (5½ oz) each, skinned', '90 g (3¼ oz) fresh wholemeal breadcrumbs', '75 g (2½ oz) chopped toasted hazelnuts', '2 tbsp chopped fresh coriander', '2 eggs, beaten', '4 tbsp white wine', '30 g (1 oz) butter', '100 ml (3½ fl oz) semi-skimmed milk', '2 tbsp chopped rocket', '500 g (1 lb 2 oz) asparagus spears', 'salt and pepper']
